sentences.english: " Our daughter waved and said, "Good-bye, Minnie .
sentences.chinese: 女儿也挥著手说，“再见了，米妮。”

sentences.english: The manager stormed into my office,waving a piece of paper about.
sentences.chinese: 经理怒气冲冲闯进我的办公室，手里挥着一份文件。

sentences.english: He could hear two men walking around the Upper Library, dusting the bookshelves with fly- whisks .
sentences.chinese: 只听得两个人走进书房，挥拂尘四下里拂拭。

sentences.english: At this time, saw a mantis sword play, to seize a dragonfly.
sentences.chinese: 这时，只见螳螂一个挥马刀，把蜻蜓抓住了。

sentences.english: On Wall Street, the ax keeps falling again and again.
sentences.chinese: 在华尔街，裁员的大斧一次又一次的挥下。
船启航时，汤姆挥了挥手。

sentences.english: Happiness is indelible, sadness is essential not to go.
sentences.chinese: 快乐是抹不掉的，忧伤是挥不去的。

sentences.english: Luo Fu laid a foundation for the Luo Fu Cultural Square together with leaders presented.
sentences.chinese: 洛夫和与会领导一起挥铲培土，为洛夫文化广场奠基。

sentences.english: She waves her wand and makes Cinderellas dress beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 她挥了挥魔棒，便把灰姑娘的衣服变得很漂亮了。

sentences.english: She waves her wand and makes Cinderellas dress beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 她挥了挥魔棒，便把灰姑娘的衣服变得很漂亮了。

sentences.english: Her arms ached from swinging the wide palmetto leaf.
sentences.chinese: 她用力挥着那把大棕榈扇，胳臂都酸痛了。

sentences.english: A man single-handedly waved machetes in one hand and a woman, Ye Guo's satchel.
sentences.chinese: 一名男子一手挥着砍刀，一手拽过女子的挎包。

sentences.english: The commanding officer flicks to make ensign one make next, ten thousand Chong volleys.
sentences.chinese: 指挥官挥着令旗一声令下，万铳齐发。

sentences.english: Serious not dispersed smoke, like the dark clouds open heart dial.
sentences.chinese: 挥之不散的烟云，仿佛内心拨不开的乌云。

sentences.english: We wave at Mama, who is all the way down by the fountain now.
sentences.chinese: 于是，我们就朝着在喷泉边上的妈妈挥了挥手。
